input.sentences: the ring barer was ready for action .
everyone in our family was there .
after the ceremony we took some pictures .
then they cut the cake and the party began .
output.sentences: The adorable ring bearer was all ready to carry the rings and was taking this task very seriously.
People arrived for the wedding because it was going to start shortly.
Because it was their second marriage, both families were very relaxed and sat wherever looked good..
The ceremony was really beautiful and then some really sweet wedding pictures were taken.
There was a beautiful three tier cake and the bride and groom cut the first pieces to start the party.
